member.name: T:ObsoleteExAttribute
member.summary: Marks the program elements that are no longer in use.

member.name: P:ObsoleteExAttribute.Message
member.summary: The text string that describes alternative workarounds.

member.name: P:ObsoleteExAttribute.TreatAsErrorFromVersion
member.summary: An information Version telling the user when the Member will be removed.
member.remarks: When the assembly version is equal to or higher than this value the will be marked to true. Must be convertable to a .

member.name: P:ObsoleteExAttribute.RemoveInVersion
member.summary: An information Version telling the user when the Member will be removed.
member.remarks: If the assembly version is equal to or higher than this value then a compile error will thrown since it should not exist in the assembly anymore. Must be convertable to a .

member.name: P:ObsoleteExAttribute.Replacement
member.summary: A value pointing to the name of the remplacement member if avaliable.
